title: A Followup to “A Letter to ROLVe”
spoiler: A week after the publishing “A Letter to ROLVe”, there were some updates and corrections to the original write.

title: A Letter to ROLVe
spoiler: A dive into ROLVe's Counter Blox game making money off of Counter Strike's assets directly.

title: Roblox and its legal issues
spoiler: A look into the Roblox's copyright issues with their hats, users uploading full songs, and their lawsuit with Cinemark USA.

title: MisterObvious: Pedophile and Liar
spoiler: I take a overview look of a popular Roblox Youtuber being caught as a pedophile, fact checking his tweets, his attempts to sue and as the question if he should get a second chance.
